name: CPSearchTemplateDelegate
desc: The interface for an object that serves as the search template’s delegate.

items.name: func searchTemplate(CPSearchTemplate, updatedSearchText: String, completionHandler: ([CPListItem]) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user updated the search criteria text.

items.name: func searchTemplate(CPSearchTemplate, selectedResult: CPListItem, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected an item from the search result.

items.name: func searchTemplateSearchButtonPressed(CPSearchTemplate)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user tapped the keyboard’s search button.
